ProjectTitle: Unravelling the molecular basis of plant immunity priming by bacterial cyclic lipopeptides
InitialFeedbackHistory:
20/12/2024
Data: Will you use samples? Please note that these are considered physical data in the context of a DMP, also list these in the table and describe how you will document, store, preserve and share them. 
Preservation: please note that the KU Leuven policy asks for 10 years of data preservation, see https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/policy
Sharing: You did not answer most of the questions here. Please make sure to complete this part of the DMP in the final DMP that FWO will ask as part of the final report at the end of your project, for more information see: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/data-sharing, https://www.ebi.ac.uk/submission/ and https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr
